description: I hope this App gets updated it has the soon to be depricated warning.
summary: It works great, right outof the box!

description:
Everything works as expected and its just, perfect! 

Just one thing, I really wish there was a feature with supports 978 Megahertz as i have the dongle but no way to use it. Otherwise, its just perfect!

works flowless with my RTL.SDR I wonder if my Lime-mini will work?

Ubuntu 22.10
works great on ubuntu with rtl-sdr
summary: works great on ubuntu with rtl-sdr

description:
works but...

depreciation warning on functioning webserver, and link to "new" server "http://0.0.0.0:8000/skyaware/" map shows no aircraft. 

also, can only get fast scrolling unreadable data when launching the first terminal as per instruction. cant see the nice readable table shown in the screen capture. wonder if the different format affects the new skyaware server.
Lo instalé y no funcionó en Xubuntu.
seria bueno que le hicieran una interfaz grafica con todo conjunto y que ademas permita controlar todos los parametros de dum1090 como el agc y demas
summary: funciona pero es un poco compleja de configurar completamente
